svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: GDP per capita vs Staff compensation as share of total expenditure in
All staff (teacher and non-teachers) compensation expressed as a percentage of direct expenditure in public educational
institutions (instructional and non-instructional) of the specified level of education. Staff compensation includes salaries,
contributions by employers for staff retirement programmes, and other allowances and benefits.
All staff compensation as % of total expenditure in primary public
Source: World Bank, World Bank – WDI
